thread.title: Hezbollah Achieves More Precise Hits on IOF Sites Near Lebanon Border
thread.title_full: Hezbollah Achieves More Precise Hits on IOF Sites Near Lebanon Border

title: Hezbollah Achieves More Precise Hits on IOF Sites Near Lebanon Border
text:
In support of the Palestinian people and resistance in Gaza and in light of the Israeli aggression on the various South Lebanon villages, the Islamic Resistance continued striking the Zionist occupation sites near the Lebanese borders with occupied Palestine.
Hezbollah military media released a series of statements outlining the conducted attacks and their outcomes:
First Operation
The first statement mentioned that the Islamic Resistance fighters targeted the Al-Baghdadi Israeli occupation site at 6:00 a.m. on Saturday, March 9, 2024, with a Burkan rocket, inflicting a direct hit.
Second Operation
Islamic Resistance fighters targeted, at 3:05 p.m. on Thursday, March 9, 2024, an assembly of Zionist soldiers in the vicinity of Hunin Castle with rocketry weapons, scoring direct hits, as the second statement pointed out.
Third Operation
The third statement revealed that at 4:00 pm on Saturday, September 3, 2024, the fighters of the Islamic Resistance targeted the Ruwaisat Al-Qarn site in the occupied Lebanese Shebaa Farms with missile weapons, striking it directly.
Fourth Operation
As per the fourth statement, the valiant fighters of the Islamic Resistance targeted, at 4:05 p.m., the Zibdin site in the occupied Lebanese Shebaa Farms with missile weapons and hit it directly.
Fifth Statement: IOF Drone Repelled
Hezbollah announced that, at 4:00 p.m., the fighters repelled an Israeli occupation drone in the border areas with occupied Palestine using appropriate weapons, forcing it to retreat to the occupied territories.
Source: Hezbollah Military Media
